item.description:
We will be getting together on the 22nd for our 4th social event. I made reservations for 22 at Slattery's in Fitchburg. Please only RSVP YES if you are POSITIVE you can attend. I can't set this up for maybes because it is a fixed number group. Our last event had 6 dropouts a day before. I understand this is unavoidable sometimes, but it keeps someone who could go from knowing that it's a possibility. Thanks!

Again, and for newbies, they cannot split the check up so please bring cash! There prices are reasonable and they have a LARGE menu (Slatterys Restaurant Menus). If there are any changes I'll keep you posted.

-Chris
item.name: 4th Atheist Meetup Dinner & Drinks
